title: User Registration with Email and Password
description: Verify that a new user can register with valid email and password and receives appropriate role assignment.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Input a valid email address, password, and confirm password
Submit the registration form
Check for successful registration confirmation
Verify that the user is assigned the default Free or Student role based on input

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check login functionality with valid email and password for all user roles (Free, Student, Teacher, Admin).

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid email and password credentials of a registered user
Click the login button
Verify user is logged in and redirected to dashboard matching role permissions

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login is prevented when invalid email or password is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input incorrect or unregistered email and/or password
Click login button
Verify error message is displayed and login is rejected

title: Dashboard Widgets Display and Functionality
description: Confirm all dashboard widgets load correctly and display accurate data for XP progress, achievements, daily rituals, constellation navigator, current lessons, teacher feed, and quick actions.

steps.description: Login as student user and navigate to dashboard
Validate XP Progress widget shows correct current progress and level
Ensure Daily Ritual widget lists current habits with correct statuses
Verify Coherence widget displays appropriate coherence metrics
Check Achievements widget shows earned badges accurately
Confirm Current Lesson widget displays active course lesson
Check Constellation Navigator and Teacher Feed widgets load data
Verify Quick Actions widget navigation links function

title: Course Catalog Browsing and Enrollment
description: Verify user can browse course catalog, view detailed course pages, enroll in courses, and see enrollment confirmed.

steps.description: Login and navigate to Course Catalog page
Browse available courses and select one course
Verify detailed course page loads with correct information
Enroll in the course
Confirm enrollment success message and course added to user profile

title: Course Video Lesson Playback and Progress Tracking
description: Ensure course video lessons play properly and user progress is tracked and saved correctly.

steps.description: Login and open an enrolled course's video lesson
Verify video loads, plays, pauses and resumes without errors
Watch partial video and navigate away
Resume lesson and confirm playback starts from last watched point
Confirm progress is updated in course progress tracker

title: Teacher Course Creation and Content Management
description: Confirm that teacher role users can access course creation page, create new courses, add video lessons, and save content without errors.

steps.description: Login as a teacher and navigate to Course Creation page
Fill in required course information fields
Add at least one video lesson with proper metadata
Submit the course creation form
Verify no errors occur and new course appears in teacher’s course list

title: Habit Tracking and Streaks Functionality
description: Validate that users can add, edit, complete, and track habits with accurate streak calculations.

steps.description: Login and navigate to Mastery Habits tab
Create a new habit with appropriate category and settings
Confirm habit is added and displayed in habit list
Mark habit as completed for today
Verify streak count increments correctly
Edit and delete habit and confirm expected updates

title: Toolbox Items Management
description: Check that toolbox items can be created, organized, and managed in the toolbox tab.

steps.description: Navigate to the Toolbox tab in Mastery system
Add a new toolbox item with relevant details
Verify new item appears in toolbox list correctly
Edit the toolbox item’s details
Confirm changes are saved
Delete toolbox item and verify it is removed

title: Calendar Integration for Habit Visualization
description: Validate user calendar displays habit completions accurately and allows marking completions for past and current days.

steps.description: Navigate to Calendar tab in Mastery system
Verify calendar shows habit completions with correct color coding or icons
Mark habit completion for current day via calendar
Confirm habit streak updates accordingly
Attempt marking completion on past day
Ensure system updates habit status and streak properly without errors

title: Skills System Progress Tracking and Visualization
description: Ensure multiple skills in cognitive, creative, discipline, and social categories are tracked accurately and radar chart visualizations render properly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to Skills section
Verify skill levels and progress data are displayed accurately
Check radar chart renders with correct skill values
Update skill progress or complete related activities
Confirm radar chart updates reflecting new data

title: Achievements Display and Progress Update
description: Confirm badge achievement system displays earned badges correctly and updates achievement progress based on user activity.

steps.description: Navigate to Achievements page
Verify all earned badges are shown with correct metadata
Perform actions to qualify for a new achievement
Check for newly earned badges appearing dynamically

title: Social Feed: Post Creation, Commenting, and Liking
description: Verify users can create posts, comment, and like posts on community social feed with updates to UI and data.

steps.description: Navigate to Community page
Create a new post with text and optional media
Confirm post appears on feed instantly
Add comment to an existing post
Verify comment is displayed beneath the post
Like a post and observe UI state change
Ensure like count increments and persists

title: Subscription Payment Processing via Stripe
description: Verify that users can subscribe, upgrade, or cancel subscriptions using Stripe integration with secure payment processing and role updates.

steps.description: Navigate to Pricing page
Select a subscription plan and initiate payment
Enter valid payment details and submit
Confirm payment is processed by Stripe successfully
Check that user role is updated appropriately in system
Cancel subscription and verify user role downgrade

title: Profile Settings Update and Avatar Customization
description: Validate that users can update personal settings and change their avatar profile picture with immediate reflection in UI.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile settings page
Modify editable profile fields such as display name, email preferences
Change or upload new avatar image
Save settings
Verify changes are saved and displayed correctly on profile

title: UI Responsiveness and Mobile Compatibility
description: Ensure application UI components and pages render correctly on multiple device sizes with mobile-first glassmorphism design and safe touch targets.

steps.description: Access the platform on different screen sizes including phones, tablets, and desktops
Verify UI elements adjust layout responsively without overlap or cutoff
Confirm glassmorphism effects and shadcn/ui + Radix UI components render as designed
Check that all interactive controls meet minimum touch target sizes and safe area margins

title: XP Progression and Level System Accuracy
description: Confirm that XP points are awarded correctly after course completions, habit completions, and community activity and that user level updates properly across the 51 levels and 4 mastery schools.

steps.description: Perform activities like completing lessons, marking habits, and engaging in community
Verify that XP is granted as per defined criteria
Confirm user level updates correctly in four schools: Ignition, Insight, Transformation, God Mode
Check that the XP progress widget and profile radar display accurate level and XP data

title: Error Handling for Network Failures and Loading States
description: Test that the application displays appropriate loading indicators and graceful error messages on network delays, API failures, or invalid inputs.

steps.description: Simulate slow or failed network responses during login, data fetch, and form submissions
Verify loading spinners or skeleton loaders display during data fetching
Ensure error messages are user-friendly and provide next steps or retry options
Submit forms with invalid or incomplete inputs
Confirm form validation prevents submission and highlights errors properly

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Ensure that different user roles (Free, Student, Teacher, Admin) have access limited to their permissions, especially for course creation and admin features.

steps.description: Login as Free user and attempt to access Teacher-only and Admin-only features
Verify access is denied and user is redirected or shown appropriate message
Login as Teacher user and verify access to course creation page
Confirm Teacher can create courses but not access Admin features
Login as Admin and verify unrestricted access to all features
Confirm Admin access to role management and subscription overrides
